price: 1. Soo dejinta Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) waa xagga Alle, Adkaadaha Sare, Xakiimka ah.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
